# Repository Stability Badges

Copy-paste badge templates for Glean contributors to add to public repository READMEs.

Each badge links to the [Repository Stability Guide](https://github.com/gleanwork/.github/blob/main/docs/repository-stability.md) so customers can understand what the stability level means.

---

## Experimental

```markdown
[![Experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Experimental-D8FD49?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=343CED)](https://github.com/gleanwork/.github/blob/main/docs/repository-stability.md#experimental)
```

---

## Prerelease

```markdown
[![Prerelease](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Prerelease-F6F3EB?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=343CED)](https://github.com/gleanwork/.github/blob/main/docs/repository-stability.md#prerelease)
```

---

## GA

```markdown
[![GA](https://img.shields.io/badge/-GA-F6F3EB?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=343CED)](https://github.com/gleanwork/.github/blob/main/docs/repository-stability.md#ga)
```
